sentences.en: Around midday, the fog lifted and puffy cumulus clouds appeared across the sky.
sentences.cn: 中午前后雾散了，满天出现了蓬松的积云。

sentences.en: At midday everyone would go down to Reg's Cafe.
sentences.cn: 中午，大家都会下楼去雷吉餐馆。

sentences.en: At midday, the roll of drums.
Beyond the windows, a November midday was uniformly grey.
sentences.cn: 往窗外望去，11月的中午始终都是灰蒙蒙的。

sentences.en: But all families have a huge Christmas dinner - usually at midday.
sentences.cn: 但所有家庭都有一顿丰盛的圣诞大餐?通常在中午.

sentences.en: By midday the irk of his pack became too oppressive.
sentences.cn: 走到中午的时候,累赘的包袱压得他受不了.

sentences.en: By midday their enthusiasm had petered out.
sentences.cn: 他们的热情到中午就烟消云散了.

sentences.en: I awoke to bright sunlight filling my room. It was already midday.
sentences.cn: 我一醒来就看见屋里阳光灿烂, 原来已是中午了.

sentences.en: It was good going to reach London by midday.
sentences.cn: 那次行进速度很快,到中午已抵达伦敦.

sentences.en: Northerly winds will increase to force six by midday.
sentences.cn: 到中午时分北风会加强到6级。

sentences.en: People were beginning to tire in the midday heat.
sentences.cn: 在正午时分的热浪之中，人们开始感到疲倦。

sentences.en: The brothers usually roll into their studio around midday.
sentences.cn: 兄弟几个总是要到正午前后才姗姗来到工作室。

sentences.en: the full heat of the midday sun
There is a midday TV program called " Lunch Break ".
sentences.cn: 中午有个电视节目叫 “ 午餐小憩 ”.

sentences.en: Thus , Saint Antoine in this vinous feature of his, until midday.
sentences.cn: 圣安托万就像这样一杯半盏地直喝到中午.

sentences.en: We stopped off in Colchester for our midday meal .
sentences.cn: 我们中途在科尔切斯特停留吃了午饭。

sentences.en: We stopped off in Colchester for our midday meal.
sentences.cn: 我们中途在科尔切斯特停留吃了午饭。

trans.tran_en: the middle of the day, at or around 12 o’clock
